column1: #text=My cupboard is bare , so it is time to go grocery shopping .
#text=I do n't want to over-spend , so I make sure to bring a grocery list .
#text=I usually have a list of items I will need as I run out of them , I post them to the fridge .
#text=I grabbed my list and looked around to see if I need any additional items .
#text=I added any items and left my house .
#text=I got into my car and drove to the nearest grocery store , my favorite one .
#text=With my list in hand , I start shopping .
#text=I went to the middle isles first , since I want to get my refrigerated and frozen items last , do n't want them getting warm or thawing before I even get them home .
#text=I chose the express lane since I was n't getting too many items .
#text=The cashier was courteous to me , as I was to her .
#text=I bought my items and headed home .
